name: PPRevealSideViewController
summary: A new container controller to easily push views on side like Path or Facebook.
description:
This is a new controller container, showing views on the side like the Facebook or Path app. It is as easy to use as a navigation controller. Sometimes, you need to push a new controller to show some options, but you don't need a full screen viewâ€¦ PPRevealSideViewController is THE controller you need.

Pan and Tap gestures are also included!
